trans-unit.source: Renders a list of items as either a static display or an interactive list.
trans-unit.target: 以静态显示或交互式列表形式呈现项列表。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: This control supports templated rendering by using device template sets and internal pagination.
trans-unit.target: 此控件支持通过使用设备模板集和内部分页的模板化呈现。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Device Filtering Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bdfeaa58-dedd-4c0d-8610-988aac0eff19) and [Pagination](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4f4c4bc-226b-46ec-ae46-00497a32f4f2).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[设备筛选概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bdfeaa58-dedd-4c0d-8610-988aac0eff19)和[分页](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4f4c4bc-226b-46ec-ae46-00497a32f4f2)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how an array binds and fills a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将绑定和填充数组<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List>。

trans-unit.source: Notice that you can programmatically set the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.DataValueField%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List> object.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，你可以以编程方式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.DataTextField%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.DataValueField%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List>对象。

trans-unit.source: for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: 用于在宿主环境中进行操作。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求值：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />；权限值：<see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the parsed element.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，表示已经过分析的元素。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the server control that an element was parsed, and adds the element to the server control's <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 通知服务器控件某个元素已经过分析，并将该元素添加到服务器控件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection" /> 对象中。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a child control using the view state.
trans-unit.target: 使用视图状态创建子控件。

trans-unit.source: This method supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法支持 .NET Framework 基础结构，但不适合直接在代码中使用。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: Set to <see langword="true" /> if the instantiated templates must bind to available data (which usually happens on the first request).
trans-unit.target: 如果实例化模板必须绑定到可用数据（通常在第一次请求时发生），则设置为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Set to <see langword="false" /> if the templates must not bind to data, and instead rely on view state to fill them in (which usually happens on subsequent postbacks).
trans-unit.target: 如果模板不能绑定到数据，而需要根据视图状态进行填充（通常在后续回发时发生），则设置为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Called by device adapters to create the default templated user interface (UI) for the control.
trans-unit.target: 由设备适配器调用，以创建控件的默认模板化用户界面 (UI)。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: The source from which items in the collection are created.
trans-unit.target: 从中创建集合项的源。

trans-unit.source: Creates items in an items collection from the specified <paramref name="dataSource" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <paramref name="dataSource" /> 参数在项集合中创建项。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: Inheriting classes can override this method for custom data-binding behavior.
trans-unit.target: 继承类可以重写此方法用于自定义数据绑定行为。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the data member to extract when data binding to a list data source.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当数据绑定到列表数据源时要提取的数据成员的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: The name of the data member to extract when data binding to a list data source.
trans-unit.target: 当数据绑定到列表数据源时要提取的数据成员的名称。

trans-unit.source: This property is only used if the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.DataSource%2A> property is of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>, rather than of type <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>.
trans-unit.target: 如果仅使用此属性的值<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.DataSource%2A>属性属于类型<xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>，而不是类型<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source of the list that is being bound.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要绑定的列表的数据源。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: The data source of the list that is being bound.
trans-unit.target: 要绑定的列表的数据源。

trans-unit.source: To bind a data source to a list, you must first use the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method to ensure data binding.
trans-unit.target: 若要将数据源绑定到列表中，必须先使用控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>方法，以确保数据绑定。

trans-unit.source: The data source can either be of type <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>, or it can be of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>.
trans-unit.target: 数据源可以是类型的<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>，也可以是类型的<xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>。

trans-unit.source: If the data source is of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.DataMember%2A> field to specify which member to extract.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据源的类型<xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>，你可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.DataMember%2A>字段来指定要提取的成员。

trans-unit.source: Specifies which property of a data-bound item to use when binding an item's <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 指定在绑定项的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text" /> 属性时要使用数据绑定项的哪个属性。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: The property of a data-bound item to use when binding an item's <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 在绑定某个项的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text" /> 属性时要使用的数据绑定项的属性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies which property of a data-bound item to use when binding an item's <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Value" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 指定在绑定项的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Value" /> 属性时要使用数据绑定项的哪个属性。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: The property of a data-bound item to use when binding an item's <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Value" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 在绑定某个项的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Value" /> 属性时要使用的数据绑定项的属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of decoration used for items.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于项的修饰的类型。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="None" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="None" />。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: An enumerated value representing the type of decoration used for items.
trans-unit.target: 一个枚举值，表示用于项的修饰的类型。

trans-unit.source: Where the target device permits, list items can be undecorated, or decorated with bullets or numbers.
trans-unit.target: 其中的目标设备允许，列表项可以未修饰名，，或使用项目符号或编号修饰。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListDecoration> enumeration has the following values:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListDecoration>枚举具有以下值：

trans-unit.source: Name
trans-unit.target: name

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: No decoration.
trans-unit.target: 无修饰。

trans-unit.source: List items are decorated with a bullet.
trans-unit.target: 列表项使用项目符号进行修饰。

trans-unit.source: List items are decorated with a number.
trans-unit.target: 列表项使用数字进行修饰。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.Decoration%2A> property to change the list to a numbered list.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.Decoration%2A>属性以将列表更改为编号列表。

trans-unit.source: The property is set in the last line of the `Page_Load` method.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，设置中的最后一行`Page_Load`方法。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example for the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List> overview.
trans-unit.target: 此示例的一个更大的示例摘自<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List>概述。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the server control contains child controls.
trans-unit.target: 确定服务器控件是否包含子控件。

trans-unit.source: If it does not, it creates child controls.
trans-unit.target: 如果不包含，则创建子控件。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to ensure that the templates are instantiated to allow programmatic access to the instantiated contents of a template.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法可以确保已对模板进行了实例化，以允许对模板的实例化内容进行编程访问。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List" /> control has an event handler registered for the appropriate <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemCommand" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List" /> 控件是否具有为相应的 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemCommand" /> 事件注册的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control has an event handler registered for the appropriate <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemCommand" /> event; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件具有一个为适当的 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemCommand" /> 事件注册的事件处理程序，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items in the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件中的项数。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件中的项数。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user selects a command that is associated with a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 在用户选择与 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List" /> 控件关联的命令时发生。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: When you render a list by using templates, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemCommand> event handler is called through the event-bubbling mechanism of ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: 当通过使用模板，呈现列表<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemCommand>通过 ASP.NET 事件冒泡机制调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is passed an argument of type <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs>, which contains information about the source item and the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandName%2A> property of the control that generated the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序传递的类型自变量<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs>，其中包含有关源项的信息和<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandName%2A>生成事件的控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to render a single list item with multiple associated interactions.
trans-unit.target: 这可以呈现具有多个关联交互的一个列表项。

trans-unit.source: On default rendering, the control provides a basic user interface (UI) that allows the user to click list items.
trans-unit.target: 默认呈现时，该控件提供基本用户界面 (UI)，用户可以单击列表项。

trans-unit.source: On postback, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemCommand> event handler is called with an argument of type <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs>, which contains information about the source item.
trans-unit.target: 在回发时，<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemCommand>用类型自变量调用事件处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs>，其中包含有关源项的信息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandName%2A> property of this object is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandName%2A>此对象的属性是`null`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemCommand> event to call a method that changes the status of an item in the list and recalculates the status totals.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemCommand>事件调用的方法的列表中的项的状态更改和重新计算状态总数。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example for the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List> overview.
trans-unit.target: 此示例的一个更大的示例摘自<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List>概述。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an item in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List" /> is bound to data.
trans-unit.target: 在将 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List" /> 中的项绑定到数据时发生。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: When an item in a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List> is created and data-bound, this event handler sets the properties of the list item from arbitrary expressions.
trans-unit.target: 中的项<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List>创建和数据绑定，此事件处理程序设置列表项的属性从任意表达式。

trans-unit.source: An item in a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List> is of type <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem>.
trans-unit.target: 中的项<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List>属于类型<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem>。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised as each data source item is bound.
trans-unit.target: 当绑定每个数据源项，将引发此事件。

trans-unit.source: This is the best time to filter or group items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection> collection, by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Value%2A> Property.
trans-unit.target: 这是对筛选器或组中的项的最佳时间<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection>集合，通过使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Value%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemDataBind> event to get the starting totals of status settings for the list.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemDataBind>事件以获取有关列表的状态设置的起始总数。

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger example for the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List> overview.
trans-unit.target: 此代码的一个更大的示例摘自<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List>概述。

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of items in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection" /> list.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection" /> 列表中的项的集合。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空集合。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: The collection of items in the list.
trans-unit.target: 列表中的项的集合。

trans-unit.source: You can add or remove items from a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List> collection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection.Remove%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection.RemoveAt%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 你可以添加或从中移除项<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List>使用进行收集<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection.Add%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection.Remove%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the items in the list are to be treated as hyperlinks.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否将列表中的项作为超链接来处理。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if items in the list are to be treated as hyperlinks; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果将列表中的项作为超链接来处理，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the value of this property is `true`, the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.DataTextField%2A> property is used to display the text of the hyperlink, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.DataValueField%2A> property is used to specify the target URL.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性的值是`true`的值<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.DataTextField%2A>属性用来显示超链接的文本和<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.DataValueField%2A>属性用于指定目标 URL。

trans-unit.source: Command events will not be generated for these links.
trans-unit.target: 命令事件将不会生成这些链接。

trans-unit.source: Thus, when the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemsAsLinks%2A> property is set to `true`, an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.OnItemCommand%2A> method will not be called because a new page will be loaded through an HTTP call.
trans-unit.target: 因此，当<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemsAsLinks%2A>属性设置为`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.OnItemCommand%2A>将不调用方法，因为将加载新的页通过 HTTP 调用。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the control state to be restored.
trans-unit.target: 表示要还原的控件状态的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Restores view-state information from a previous page request that was saved by the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.SaveViewState" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 从用 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.SaveViewState" /> 方法保存的上一个页面请求还原视图状态信息。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件源。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the event for the server control is passed up the page's UI server control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 确定服务器控件的事件是否沿页的 UI 服务器控件层次结构向上传递。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the event has been canceled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件已被取消，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: An object (defined by <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs" />) that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含事件数据的对象（由 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs" /> 定义）。

trans-unit.source: Called when a list item generates an event as a result of user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 通过用户交互而使列表项生成了事件时调用。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemCommand> event.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemCommand>事件。

trans-unit.source: Inheriting classes can override this method to perform other tasks.
trans-unit.target: 继承类可以重写此方法以执行其他任务。

trans-unit.source: An object (defined by <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListDataBindEventArgs" />) that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含事件数据的对象（由 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListDataBindEventArgs" /> 定义）。

trans-unit.source: Called when a list item is data bound.
trans-unit.target: 对某个列表项进行数据绑定时调用。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemDataBind> event.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemDataBind>事件。

trans-unit.source: Inheriting classes can override this method to perform other tasks.
trans-unit.target: 继承类可以重写此方法以执行其他任务。

trans-unit.source: An object defined by an <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> object that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> 对象定义的对象。

trans-unit.source: Called when the control is custom paginated and needs more data.
trans-unit.target: 在对控件进行了自定义分页，并且需要更多数据时调用。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: Contains the index number of the current page prior to pagination.
trans-unit.target: 包含分页之前的当前页的索引号。

trans-unit.source: Contains the index number of the current page after pagination.
trans-unit.target: 包含分页之后的当前页的索引号。

trans-unit.source: Paginates a control.
trans-unit.target: 对控件分页。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> object that represents an optional event argument to be passed to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 表示要传递给事件处理程序的可选事件参数的 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List" /> object of a postback event.
trans-unit.target: 通知 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List" /> 对象回发事件。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: Saves any server control view-state changes that have occurred since the time the page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 保存将页面回发到服务器之后发生的所有服务器控件视图状态更改。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the server control's current view state.
trans-unit.target: 返回服务器控件的当前视图状态。

trans-unit.source: If there is no view state associated with the control, this method returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有与该控件关联的视图状态，则此方法返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An optional event argument to be passed to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 要传递到事件处理程序的一个事件参数（可选）。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent(System.String)" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent(System.String)" />。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: Causes tracking of view-state changes to the server control so they can be stored in the server control's <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 导致跟踪服务器控件的视图状态的更改，以便这些更改可以存储到服务器控件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> 对象中。

trans-unit.source: This object is accessible through the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 通过 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState" /> 属性可访问此对象。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。
